page.title: 01NATURE RESERVE RIBBLE MARSH
page.content: On July 13th 1985, eight of us went on the marsh with Mr.Mawby.We passed under an electric fence and saw some shellducks, lapwings, oyster-catchers and a grey plover.Then we came to a big channel which we had to cross. On the other side we found the nest of a black-headed gull.We heard alot of screeching from gulls and common terns flying overhead.We found a tern's nest with one chick and two eggs.Mr.Mawby weighed, measured and then ringed the chick.Some of the chicks had been killed.When we moved away the mother came back with some fish. On the way back a man showed us a redshank's nest.We passed under another electric fence and then the man said "You will have to be careful where you stand because the nest is
